channel.title: Project Guardian Dodian Devolution *new*
channel.description:
Hello I'm back again with a new release of Dodian but the way I want. This server Also has all the dupes fixed like all my other Dodian releases. But if there's still blackscreen just add the command ::blackscreen from my other Dodian release, or just fix it yourself not sure if its still there.
- FIXED EMOTES - New combat. - Working prayer. - Thiefing on objects. - Magic requires runes. - Talking npcs. - Working Cetrude's cat quest - Working Lost City quest. - New home, Falador. - Other new areas are, Rimmington, Draynor Village. - Fully fishing with animations. - Fully fletching with animations. - Fully firemaking with animations. - No dupes - Dueling - You can't alch shop items - Npc changing face to north, south, west, east. - Wilderness levels
Server pictures: Fishing [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/8y836q.jpg[/img] Woodcut guide [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29w1s7m.jpg[/img] Woodcut [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/14nme4j.jpg[/img] Cats [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2yoqvq9.jpg[/img] Fletching [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/nn4h6s.jpg[/img] Firemaking [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ncjpkw.jpg[/img] Thiefing [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2hpt3cy.jpg[/img] Alching [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/rcvbya.jpg[/img] Flax picking [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ndrnm9.jpg[/img] Emotes [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/fohxtj.jpg[/img] Essence minning [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/35btjd3.jpg[/img] Everything [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/152fd04.jpg[/img]
When download my server, please leave a reply thanks.
Server download: [url=http://uppit.com/izcks2mriy4u/Project_Guardian_317.rar]http://uppit.com/izcks2mriy4u/Project_Guardian_317.rar[/url]
Client: Im searching on my computer for it but i think if losed it.
Blackscreen fix tutorial:
Hello i have got two ways to fix the blackscreen. You need make the coords on another location then the starting location where every new player starts.
if (command.startsWith("blackscreen")) { teleportToX = 2605; //add your coords teleportToY = 3089; //add your coords } Way two is alot better then it's always fixed. When you login you automatic get teleport to the location so never nobody have blackscreen.
Search: GetLastLogin(playerLastLogin));
Under that add:
teleportToX = 2606; //add your coords teleportToY = 3102; //add your coords heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
Now when you login you get teleported automatic.

item.title: Project Guardian Dodian Devolution *new*
item.dc:creator: @jennipher11 jennipher11
item.description:
@jennipher11 wrote:

Hello I’m back again with a new release of Dodian but the way I want. This server Also has all the dupes fixed like all my other Dodian releases. But if there’s still blackscreen just add the command ::blackscreen from my other Dodian release, or just fix it yourself not sure if its still there.

  • FIXED EMOTES
  • New combat.
  • Working prayer.
  • Thiefing on objects.
  • Magic requires runes.
  • Talking npcs.
  • Working Cetrude’s cat quest
  • Working Lost City quest.
  • New home, Falador.
  • Other new areas are, Rimmington, Draynor Village.
  • Fully fishing with animations.
  • Fully fletching with animations.
  • Fully firemaking with animations.
  • No dupes
  • Dueling
  • You can’t alch shop items
  • Npc changing face to north, south, west, east.
  • Wilderness levels

Server pictures:
Fishing

8y836q.jpg749×493

Woodcut guide

When download my server, please leave a reply thanks.

Server download:
http://uppit.com/izcks2mriy4u/Project_Guardian_317.rar

Client: Im searching on my computer for it but i think if losed it.

Blackscreen fix tutorial:

Hello i have got two ways to fix the blackscreen.
You need make the coords on another location then the starting location where every new player starts.

if (command.startsWith(“blackscreen”)) {
teleportToX = 2605; //add your coords
teleportToY = 3089; //add your coords
}
Way two is alot better then it’s always fixed.
When you login you automatic get teleport to the location so never nobody have blackscreen.

Search:
GetLastLogin(playerLastLogin));

Under that add:

teleportToX = 2606; //add your coords
teleportToY = 3102; //add your coords
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}

Now when you login you get teleported automatic.

Read full topic
